reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great building toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fun toy
reviews.reviewText: Kids really enjoy playing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the BEST bargains I've found on Amazon - Almost identical to our $25 Set
reviews.reviewText: We received an almost identical set of building blocks as a gift for my kids (2.5yo & 7yo) recently and we were so hooked, we needed more. As a building set, it has infinite possibilities for educational play and the kids AND adults in our household just couldn't put it down. We just wanted more pieces to build bigger and better things because we were having so much fun.But when I looked into buying another set, I discovered they cost about $25 per set. I saw this set and worried the quality wouldn't live up to the set we already owned, but I decided to try them out. THESE ARE WONDERFUL!!! I can't tell them apart from the other set and they were SO, SO much less expensive.I'm buying at least two more of these sets because we're thrilled with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality and picture booklet
reviews.reviewText: We liked this product I bought it for my 3yr old and my 5yr old likes to play with it too, what I don't like is that it didn't come with a booklet pictures on how they can make images with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun
reviews.reviewText: These are sturdy and colorful, perfect toy for q creative little mind...hours of good fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great STEM toy
reviews.reviewText: This was supposed to be a birthday present for my soon-to-be 3 year old, but he found the package and I couldn't say no. He will spend over an hour at a time with this set, building and exploring new ways to put the parts together. I can see him learning as he plays. It is both fun and educational and gives me some quiet time that I can feel good about. Great for dexterity, imagination, trial and error and planning skills. I need another set or two because he sometimes doesn't want to break down a toy to build another. But can make several things at once with just one set. Would buy more sets if the price came back down again but the price has been increasing even though it is still listed as on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall great toy for imaginative preschool-age builders
reviews.reviewText: My 4-yr-old plays with this set daily. We ended up getting a second set so he can build more things and play with them together. Nice that this set comes with 2 screwdrivers/socket wrenches for playing with a friend. Also, I counted and there were actually 110 pieces, so that's nice. There are things with the toy itself that could be improved--like making the screws longer so that they can connect more than two pieces, or making the cubes and longer to accommodate a wheel in each side (as it is, they're pretty useless).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy! Educational and fair priced.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my six year old grandson who has autism. He really loved it! He has played with it quite a lot. We own lots of legos which he also loves, but was looking for something different to keep him challenged. It has been good for him to learn a new system of building things.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Quality and Value for Money.
reviews.reviewText: Liked the product. Good alternative to blocks

reviews.reviewTitle: Great construction set and even better vendor
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set to gift to my nephew for Christmas 2020. Due to some circumstances, the set never went to my nephew but remained with me, unopened and unused until my toddler found the container. To my disappointment, when we opened the package in 2022 all of the nuts were missing, so we could not effectively build most items shown in the construction booklet/guide. I reached out to the company and explain what had happened and they very generously replaced the entire set. (One and a half years later!!) I am so impressed with with their level of service and understanding. I hope to purchase from them again. If you are on the fence about buying this set, go for it! it's been so much fun to build and bond with my baby.
The product is good. The only minus was that we got 1 piece (90 degree angle) less and my son was sad that he could not make something that he started because of that.
Wonderful product! My grandkids love it
